full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS KYI BZLOG BSGYUR GA-YANG NYAMS GSO BA'I CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES BZLOG PA BYAS MJUG GI CHO GA DKYUS LTAR BYA, DE NAS GA-YANG NYAMS NA GA-YANG GI PHYOGS SU GTONG GOD KHA RGAD GDON YIN BDUD GNOD DAM THE TSHOM ZA BA'I GNAS SU BSKYAL, SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR MI RNAMS NOR PHYUGS RNAMS GA-YANG NYAMS NAS GOD KHA DANG 'BUL 'PHONGS SHIN TU MANG ZHING, DE NYID ZHI BA'I PHYIR DU RGYAL PO RNAM THOS SRAS KYI SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYA TSUL 'DI NI DAD RTZON LDAN PA DGE TSUL SHES RAB RDO RJE YANG YANG BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS BHIKshA SANGHA RATNA TRA SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI THO YON GRAGS PA BZANG PO'O, ,'DI KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,)
